title: Feit Electric Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED Light Bulbs, Single Pole or 3-Way Toggle, Wall Plate and Wire Nut Installation Included, DIM/Toggle/2, 2 Pack

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #113,101 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #248 in Dimmer Switches       #248 in Dimmer Switches

description: Elevate your home lighting with the DIM/TOGGLE/2 dimmer switch 2-pack from Feit Electric. This modern dimmer switch seamlessly blends functionality with style. It features a sleek toggle switch for easy power control and an intuitive slide dimmer for effortless brightness adjustment. Create the perfect ambiance with adjustable dimming range and minimum level settings. For increased safety, the dimmer switch provides overheat protection and supports up to 600W of incandescent or 200W of LED lighting. Installation is a breeze and includes all necessary installation hardware. The dimmer switch is compatible with single pole or 3-way configurations, for use in any space. Each 2-pack comes complete with wall plates for a polished, finished look.
shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Dimmer Switches
feature_bullets: ✅ TRADITIONAL TOGGLE DESIGN with SMOOTH DIMMING CONTROL - Enjoy the classic look and feel of a traditional toggle light switch while benefitting from modern dimming technology. This dimmer switch offers smooth, flicker-free dimming for enhanced lighting control, allowing you to set the perfect ambiance in any room. Designed for compatibility with both dimmable LED light bulbs and incandescent bulbs.

✅ SINGLE POLE or 3-WAY CONFIGURATION - The Feit Electric Toggle Dimmer Switch is designed for compatibility with both single-pole and 3-way switch applications, this dimmer offers flexible lighting control options to suit your needs. Easily adjust lighting levels in one location or from two different points with the 3-way function. Ideal for use in various areas of your home, including living rooms, bedrooms, hallways, and kitchens.

✅ BUILT-IN OVERHEAT PROTECTION for ENHANCED SAFETY - Built with safety in mind, this dimmer switch includes advanced overheat protection to prevent potential hazards and ensure long-lasting, dependable operation. The device will automatically reduce power if it detects excessive heat buildup, helping to protect your electrical system and your home. You can dim your lights with confidence, knowing this switch is designed with safety in mind.

✅ WIDE COMPATIBILITY for VARIOUS LIGHTING NEEDS - Supports up to 600 watts of incandescent lighting or 200 watts of dimmable LED or CFL lighting, making it perfect for a variety of rooms and applications. Ideal for use in living rooms, kitchens, dining areas, or bedrooms to create the perfect ambiance.

✅ EASY INSTALLATION with WALL PLATE & WIRE NUTS INCLUDED - Designed for a hassle-free installation, this dimmer switch comes with a matching wall plate and wire nuts, so you have everything you need for a quick setup. The detailed installation guide makes it easy for DIY enthusiasts to get their dimmer switch up and running in no time.

✅ ENERGY-SAVING & COST-EFFECTIVE - Dimming your lights not only enhances the atmosphere but also saves energy. By lowering the brightness of your lights, you can reduce electricity consumption and extend the lifespan of your bulbs, making this dimmer switch a cost-effective solution for any home.

✅ 1-YEAR WARRANTY for PEACE of MIND - Backed by Feit Electric’s 1-year warranty, this toggle dimmer switch provides reliable lighting control and is built to last. If you experience any issues within the warranty period, Feit Electric will provide support to ensure customer satisfaction.

customers_say: Customers find that the dimmer switch works well and has no flickering issues.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsEasy to install, very adjustable and works with LED bulbs
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: This switch replaced an old round knob dimmer switch in the bathroom to control LED bulbs over the sink. It has worked out very well. We normally set the upper slider for a day or night setting and leave it alone, using the bottom horizontal switch to turn the lights on/off...  It does a good job of controlling the LED light bulbs over the full range, no flickers or null spots. Easy install and excellent directions too.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: easy to put up. Instructions are clear. Didn't need my husbands help! Works very well

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I tried 3 different dimmer switches, and they didn't prevent the LED bathroom light from flickering. I installed this switch, and from the get-go, there was no flickering at all. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsWork OK, but very sensitive.  Not much play in the dim.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Work OK, but very sensitive.  Not much play in the dim.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2025

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsMake sure you have DIMMABLE LEDs
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: The switch and dimmer function work great. I did have to change my bulbs because the bulbs I had in the fixture were not, which caused them to flicker when turned down. Once you get it installed, there is an adjustment knob on the side of the slider. Be sure to adjust this before putting the plate on.I installed my switch to control a ceiling fan light combination. I don't run the fan much so my intent was never to run the fan with the bulbs dimmed. However, even with the adjustment knob and the slider turned all the way up, the fan motor sounds like it is starving for power. That being said, I will switch it back to a standard switch, but the dimmable switch does what it says it does great. Smooth action on the slider and smooth transition of light brightness once you have the adjustment done correctly. I reccommend this item.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 stars2 pack sliding dimmer switches
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: This comes as a 2 pack of the sliding dimmer switches.The switches are white in color and each come with a matching white 1-gang decorator face plate.The switch was easy to install, replacing older dial style dimmer switches.I love that I have the option to dim with the small slide on the side, but the switch has the paddle on/off piece that makes it easy for my children to turn off and on and have it turn on at the brightness level that we all prefer. If we need it brighter or dimmer we can adjust it too.My biggest issue with the old switches is that my 5 year old would turn the dial down until they thought the light was off but it wasn't actually off. With the new switches it's a definitive on/ off.

customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsWork great! And have a very slim install depth for older boxes
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I needed a 3-way dimmer switch for an older/smaller gang box. These fit with plenty of room to spare.The dimming is smooth and without flickering or noise.I like the larger simmer paddle versus the other designs with the tiny nubs.Knocking off one star because the listing title says it includes the wall plates, but they do not come with one.
